title: Los Angeles Tries to Claw Back Public Records After Police Invent New Definition of “Undercover”
description:
The city released 9,310 Los Angeles Police Department headshots to a journalist. Six months later, it’s suing to get them back.

The post Los Angeles Tries to Claw Back Public Records After Police Invent New Definition of “Undercover” appeared first on The Intercept.

title: “How to Blow Up a Pipeline” Movie Poses Terror Threat, Kansas City Intel Agency Claims
description:
The Kansas City Regional Fusion Center warned law enforcement of a “developing threat” — but with no specifics.

The post “How to Blow Up a Pipeline” Movie Poses Terror Threat, Kansas City Intel Agency Claims appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Texas Judge Cosplaying as Medical Expert Has Consequences Beyond the Abortion Pill
description:
The FDA has the power to ignore the mifepristone ruling, legal experts say. But only the courts can cure its dangerous implications.

The post Texas Judge Cosplaying as Medical Expert Has Consequences Beyond the Abortion Pill appeared first on The Intercept.
